name: HouseOrla
_source: s;Orla;...{w} Tch.{w} What's coming back here{br}gotta feel so bittersweet for?{w}{clear}Wasn't that long ago that I was{br}working my ass off to get outta here.{w}{clear}Place is like a shackle around my{br}neck...{w} but now, it feels different.{w}{clear}Heh{c:expression;Orla;Smile}.{w}{c:expression;Orla;HalfCloseEyes} And to think, if I'd been able{br}to leave, I wouldn't be here today.{w}{clear}Could've gotten out before the end.{w}{clear}...{w}{c:expression;Orla;CloseEyes} If only things had turned out{br}differently, then...{w} maybe...
s;SOrla;I'm leaving.{w} Gotta get outta this{br}town.{w} I already told you that.

s;OrlaMother;And I already told you it's a fool's{br}dream!{w} What are you thinking, girl?{w}{clear}You'll wander the world, see the{br}sights, live like a wild child!?{w}{clear}It's stupid.{w} You know better.

s;SOrla;I know worse, too, and it's hard to{br}get much worse than this dump.{w}{clear}Face it, ma{semicolon}{w} Eislinn's a dead end.{w}{clear}The kinda town you only live in{br}because you haven't gotten out yet.{w}{clear}The kinda town you don't want to{br}grow old in.{w} And I want out.{w} Now.
s;OrlaMother;But you can't!{w} You have to-
s;SOrla;Why not!?{w} Why are you holding me{br}back!?{w} I finally have a real shot!{w}{clear}A chance to escape, to do something{br}with my life instead of...{w} this!{w}{clear}So why are you-?
s;OrlaMother;He fell ill last night.{w} The healers{br}have been tending to him, but...{w}{clear}they say he'll never work again.
s;SOrla;...{w} But that's...{w} That would mean...
s;OrlaMother;I'm too old, Orla.{w} Too frail.{w} There's{br}no work for an old woman like me.{w}{clear}But you...{w} you're still young.{w} Fit.|Able.{w} You're the only one we have.
s;SOrla;But I...{w} I *just* got out!{w} You're{br}telling me you want me to stay!?
s;OrlaMother;I'm telling you you have to stay.{w}{clear}If you don't, your father and I...|we...{w} we don't have another option.
s;SOrla;...{w} That's not fair.{w} I did{br}everything right.{w} Everything!{w}{clear}It's not fair!

s;OrlaMother;I...{w} I know it's not.{w} Orla, if I{br}could get you out of here, I would.{w}{clear}Foolish or not, better my daughter{br}die a fool than live like...{w} this.{w}{clear}But...{w} we'll starve without you.|We need you.{w} I'm...{w} so sorry.

s;SOrla;It's...{w} it's fine.{w} It's fine!{w}{clear}I'll figure something out.{w} I just...|I was so close.{w} I was almost out!{w}{clear}This gods damned town is gonna{br}be my grave, and I'm sick of it!

s;Orla;...{w}{c:expression;Orla;NoSmile} I was more right than I knew.|{c:expression;Orla;HalfCloseEyes}A grave...{w} and this house is a tomb.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Orla;OpenEyes}Whatever.{w} It's too late for me, now.|All I can do is take down as many of{br}these bastards as I can before I die.{w}{clear}If I had it my way, I'd keep killing{br}until even their emperor was dead.{w}{clear}But...{w} I'll make do with this rabble.{w}{clear}Mom...{w} wherever you are...{w} I'm sorry{br}I couldn't get out.{w} Maybe next time.
